name: Tokyo Cop
description:
to go to investigate the case and to help the sweet Kathy, sister of his friend killed is old flame of youth. Eddie will find himself, a stranger in a land unknown to him, having to deal with an international mafia gang and the obstacles posed by the laws and the police themselves. Will you be able to discover the truth about the murder of your friend? Will you be able to juggle the difficulties that the bureaucracy and the laws will pose to you? Your choices will affect the development of the game, bringing you different endings, and allowing you to unlock special scenes.


- Story-rich visual novel with detective/comedy setting.
- replay gallery
- 800 images
- multiple ending
